column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=As a young man I had always enjoyed watching the trains go by .
#text=Although there are no passenger trains anywhere near where i live there are trains that deliver to local plants and factories .
#text=One day I decided that as the train slowed down as it rumbled across the road while cars where stopped I would run and grab hold of one of the train car handles and sneak a ride .
#text=I grabbed the handle and thought my arm was going to rip off as I tried to pull myself onto the train .
#text=Finally I made it and climbed up onto the top of the train car .
#text=I rode like that for several miles enjoying the vibration and speed of the train as it rumbled along the tracks .
#text=When it slowed down enough before it 's next stop I jumped off and hit the ground rolling .
#text=Got battered and bruised but the experience was well worth the pain .
